name: Terraform Arena
description:
Description:

Control a robot only equipped with a gun to defeat hordes of killer robots, while the arena changes every 10 seconds. This game was developed for Ludum Dare 51 with the topic "Every 10 seconds".

How to play?
  • Defeat as many robots as possible.
  • Don't touch glowing red objects.
  • Be aware of where the arena changes.
Controls:

Movement - Arrow keys/WASD

Shoot - Left Mouse

Dash - Space Bar

Pause Menu - P

Contributor:

Pascal Fitzner
